Name: Tiny Tank
About the game: ABOUT TINY TANK: The era of Tiny Tank begins! Tiny Tank is a Classic Hero Shooter, In this game you only have one objective and that is to… SURVIVE! Hold out and battle the hordes of enemy's with each wave being harder then the last. Enjoy playing throughout the game modes. Each game mode has their own maps especially made for them. locations: All locations are inspired by Locations throughout history with no exact timeline. Some maps are extremely out there and fantasised. All maps are made around short to medium engagement with some being more difficult then others. Social Media/Support: Stay tuned for upcoming major updates. Each update will bring brand-new locations, All upcoming updates will be free for all players. Tiny Tank is my first project I’ve worked on, Share any feedback through comments, discord and YouTube. Supporting us on Patron is always a good way to show some extra support.
